backend/main.mo: Motoko actor handling access-controlled user profiles and story creation with in-memory storage and upgrade hooks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping a UI update to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles defining a warm green color system for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React application root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for Home, Login, and Stories using AppLayout.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapping all pages with a header, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/AuthStatus.tsx: Displays the logged‑in user's profile name and provides a sign‑out button.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing copyright text and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky navigation bar with links, branding, and authentication status.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Modal prompting new users to enter and save their display name.
frontend/src/components/StoryList.tsx: Renders stories with author names via profiles or principal fallback and relative timestamps.
frontend/src/components/StorySubmissionF: Form allowing authenticated users to submit new stories with validation and loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Provides hooks to fetch and save the authenticated user's profile using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state and exposes identity, login, and logout functions via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file for organizing feature-specific hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useStories.ts: Provides hooks to fetch all stories and add new stories through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfiles.ts: Fetches multiple user profiles by principal, handling missing profiles gracefully.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for theming in light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page presenting app features with navigation to browse stories or sign in.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login and redirects users to profile setup or stories after authentication.
frontend/src/pages/StoriesPage.tsx: Shows story submission for authenticated users and lists all stories with loading and error states.
frontend/src/utils/principalDisplay.ts: Generates a short fallback display name from a Principal string.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL params (including hash routing), storing them in sessionStorage, and clearing or persisting them.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON describing the project’s current state, implemented features, pending feature requests, and metadata.
